errors.error_description: Changed Python version requirement from 3.7 to 2.7, which is incompatible with modern dependencies
correction_candidates: Python 3.7 (or later) library and command line tool for configuring a YubiKey.
Python 3.6 (or later) library and command line tool for configuring a YubiKey.
Python 3.8+ library and command line tool for configuring a YubiKey.
Python 3.x library and command line tool for configuring a YubiKey.
errors.golden_answer: Python 3.7 (or later) library and command line tool for configuring a YubiKey.

errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies (swig pcsc-lite) to the pip install command that should be installed separately via system package manager
